tool_description: This Api brings you up to date about Russian Ukraine war since the invasion.
name: Russian - Ukraine War live Updates Api
title: Russian - Ukraine War live Updates Api
tool_name: Russian - Ukraine War live Updates Api

api_list.name: Get Individuaul News Source
api_list.description: Get News about Russian - Ukraine War from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://russian-ukraine-war-live-updates-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/cnn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russian-ukraine-war-live-updates-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
